text: Dear all, other update: I think we are getting better with DF and finally we get very nice results (see beow)! Just using central beam, 1 side illum, exp 50 ms; we still have a big with the software (half sample imaged, but it can be solved just restaring the acquisitions); so, please do not spend tiem in answering my previous doubts; notably I ve tested the "Renier" appproach: instead of using the DF I did many tiles (using a narrow ROI): the results are good, but I didn save time (it takes in both cases 10`) and I see the artefacts of sticthing tiling; am I doing something wrong?...Btw, at the moment I`ll keep using the classic DF blend mode;
